title: Welcome!
text:
Welcome to WSSD Parents for Balanced Tech Use! Our mission is to create a supportive and non-judgmental community for parents within the Wallingford-Swarthmore School District to foster open conversations and shared learning about the impact of smartphones and social media on our children.
We acknowledge that every family parents differently, but we all share the goal of making informed and intentional choices regarding our childrenâ€™s tech use.
Our objectives are:

Community Learning
Fostering Communication
Empowering Families

We are exploring a parent pact based on the book The Anxious Generation by Jonathan Haidt and his 4 new norms:

No smartphones before high school
No social media before age 16
Phone-free schools
More independence, free play, and responsibility in the real world.

If you arenâ€™t sure or your kids already have a smartphone, please join the Facebook group anyway ðŸ™‚
